BugInstance.message: Class org.apache.shardingsphere.data.pipeline.scenario.migration.api.impl.MigrationJobAPI has a circular dependency with other classes
Method org.apache.shardingsphere.data.pipeline.scenario.migration.api.impl.MigrationJobAPI.getStandardProperty(Map, String) checks a map with containsKey(), before using get()

Method org.apache.shardingsphere.data.pipeline.scenario.migration.api.impl.MigrationJobAPI.listMigrationSourceResources(PipelineContextKey) allocates an object that is used in a constant way in a loop

Method org.apache.shardingsphere.data.pipeline.scenario.migration.api.impl.MigrationJobAPI.buildTargetPipelineDataSourceConfiguration(ShardingSphereDatabase) does not presize the allocation of a collection

Method org.apache.shardingsphere.data.pipeline.scenario.migration.api.impl.MigrationJobAPI.buildYamlJobConfiguration(PipelineContextKey, MigrateTableStatement) does not presize the allocation of a collection
Method org.apache.shardingsphere.data.pipeline.scenario.migration.api.impl.MigrationJobAPI.cleanTempTableOnRollback(String) executes SQL queries inside of loops
This use of java/sql/Statement.execute(Ljava/lang/String;)Z can be vulnerable to SQL injection (with JDBC)
This API MD5 (MDX) is not a recommended cryptographic hash function
Unconstrained method org.apache.shardingsphere.data.pipeline.scenario.migration.prepare.MigrationJobPreparer.initIncrementalTasks(MigrationJobItemContext) converts checked exception to unchecked
